-- test: beans list all --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans
-- expect:regex --
NAME\s+TYPE\s+SCOPE\s+DEPENDENCIES
-- expect --
testScheduledTasks


-- test: beans filter by pattern --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans --filter testScheduled
-- expect:regex --
NAME\s+TYPE\s+SCOPE\s+DEPENDENCIES
-- expect:regex --
testScheduledTasks\s+c\.e\.t\.TestScheduledTasks\s+singleton
-- expect:not --
spring.mvc


-- test: beans output name only --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans --output name
-- expect --
testScheduledTasks
-- expect --
testActuatorApplication


-- test: beans with no results --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans --filter nonexistentbean12345
-- expect --
No beans matching filter: nonexistentbean12345


-- test: beans output name with filter --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans --filter testScheduled --output name
-- expect --
testScheduledTasks
-- expect:not --
testActuatorApplication


-- test: beans output wide format --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} beans --output wide --filter testScheduled
-- expect --
Context:
-- expect --
Beans:
-- expect --
Bean: testScheduledTasks
-- expect --
Type:
-- expect --
Scope: singleton
-- expect:regex --
(Resource:|Dependencies)
